LPR.ModeSpecificDescription:
Click a position on the map to set were the pod spawns.


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModePresetDescription:
Choose from one of the preset points on the left


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModePresetSubText:
*Presets can be modified in mod folder,
/Presets/presets.txt,
LPR.ModeInputTextDescription:
For more advanced users type your desired coords in manually


Press play to 
start!
LPR.ModeRandomDescription:
Press the button "Randomize Point" for a randompoint (can be in void so be carefull)

Press play to 
start!
LPR.OptionsDescription:
Modify experimental spawning properties or post-intro settings!

Press play to 
start!
LPR.HeavyPodDescription: Toggle the life pod sinking underwater at the start of the game. Can be disabled later though the mod config in the pause menu
LPR.FirstTimeAnimationsDescription: Toggle the unique animations the first time you leave the pod
LPR.CinematicOverlayDescription: Toggle the overlay durring the pod falling cinematic, disable if you experience eye strain or nausea
LPR.CustomIntroDescription: Toggle Custom intro. (You know, how the pod falls from orbit with this mod installed)
LPR.AirSpawnDescription: Toggle the life pod spawning in the air. This setting will be ignored if the custom into is enabled
